alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 17 at 3:22AM MST until January 18 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 5 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 6 and 13 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains, Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 11 AM MST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 5 AM to 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible and tire chains may be required for some vehicles. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
